label: gamma and Z orthogonal despite ancestry
reason: Requires Wolfram Alpha API, experimental data, or advanced computation not yet implemented
note: PENDING: gamma and Z orthogonal despite ancestry. Validation: EM (massless) distinct from weak
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
import math
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
shadow = reg.shadow_sector       # 125
chi = reg.chi_eff                # 144
roots = reg.roots_total          # 288

# Photon-Z mixing angle (Weinberg angle)
# gamma and Z emerge from B0-W3 mixing, orthogonal eigenstates
sin_sq_theta_W = 1 - (shadow / chi)  # ~0.132
theta_W = math.asin(math.sqrt(sin_sq_theta_W)) * 180 / math.pi
verified = 25 < theta_W < 35  # Experimental: ~28.7 degrees
